title: About us
text:
Tiago Paixão
Tiago loves modelling. The mathematical kind, not the fashion kind.



João Costa
João likes to build plumbing for genomic data. He reads reads like it’s the matrix.









André Barros
André is the master of the p-value, captain of the multiple test correction, and commander of random effects. 



Hugo Lainé
Hugo never shies away from differently expressing genes and opinions.









Maria Guedes
Maria likes to put things (and people) in their place.
